oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Dixon-Memorial United Methodist Church, 2000 October
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A photograph of Dixon-Memorial United Methodist Church located at 1111 Buchanan Street at Twelfth Avenue in Nashville, Tennessee. According to the church's cornerstone, the structure was erected in 1938. The congregation was formed in 1889. The foundation is cement. The walls are red brick. The roof is made of grey shingles. The windows are stained glass. The doors are wood. Forms part of the Historic Nashville, Inc. Sacred Sites Survey Project. 1 photograph : col. ; 4 x 6 in.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Dixon-Memorial United Methodist Church (Nashville, Tenn.)
